Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.tui

Class TuiPrintStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
java.io.FilterOutputStream
java.io.PrintStream
it.polimi.ingsw.client.tui.TuiPrintStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable
class TuiPrintStream extends PrintStream
Console PrintStream, supporting ansi escape characters

    • eraseScreen

      public void eraseScreen()
      Erase all content on the entire console screen
      Implementation Note:
      does not work well on Windows (it does not erase the content)

    • eraseInDisplay

      public void eraseInDisplay()
      Erase all content visible on the console screen

    • saveCursorPos

      @MustBeClosed public NoExceptionAutoCloseable saveCursorPos()

    • translateCursor

      @MustBeClosed public NoExceptionAutoCloseable translateCursor(int row, int col)
      Moves the cursor of the given row + col relative to the current translation position and translates each subsequent printed new line to said position. When the returned object is closed, the current translation is brought back to the previous position.
      Parameters:
      row - row to translate to, relative to the current translation position
      col - col to translate to, relative to the current translation position
      Returns:
      closeable to go back to the previous translation position

    • translateCursorToCol

      @MustBeClosed public NoExceptionAutoCloseable translateCursorToCol(int col)
      Moves the cursor of the given col relative to the current translation position and translates each subsequent printed new line to said position. When the returned object is closed, the current translation is brought back to the previous position.
      Parameters:
      col - col to translate to, relative to the current translation position
      Returns:
      closeable to go back to the previous translation position

    • cursor

      public void cursor(int row, int col)
      Move the cursor to the given absolute row and col
      Parameters:
      row - absolute row to move to
      col - absolute col to move to
